mapper.select: select seq, category1, category2, category3, task_desc as taskDesc, priority, origEst, currEst, elapsed, remain, reg_date as regDate, reg_id as regId, update_date as updateDate, update_id as updateId from tasks
mapper.insert: insert into tasks (category1, category2, category3, task_desc, priority, origEst, currEst, elapsed, remain, reg_date, reg_id) values ( #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{taskDesc}, #{priority}, #{origEst}, #{currEst}, #{elapsed}, #{remain}, sysdate(), 'jwmoon' )
